Frontyard: ^We finally arrive at the old factory.
^The place seems abandonned except for a faint light dancing from one of the broken windows of the first floor...

c-0: ^The door does not seems to have been opened in years.
^It is jammed at first but after a few tries you manage to open it.
c-1: ^There is nothing of interest in the backyard.

Hall: ^Everything is the hall seems stuck in time but for the natural decay. It is as if people had just stopped coming to work one day.
^Some things seems to have been recently moved though.

c-0: ^There used to be a door there but it is gone now. The room is wide open.
c-1: ^The stairs havec crumbled. You won't be able to reach the upper floors this way.

Bedroom: ^The medical equipment suggests that some medical experiments were done here.

c-0:
^It is still warm.

^Someone has been lying here recently.
